lyrics:
20 contributorsin a little while lyricsverse 1

and the daylight has no air

oh hoo hoo hoo

well ive known her since since she was

a little girl with spanish eyes
oh when i saw her in a pram they pushed her by
ooh hoo my how youve grown
well its been been its been a little while
see u2 liveget tickets as low as 450you might also likechorus
oh hoo hoo hoo
oh hoo hoo hoo
oh hoo hoo hoo

bridge

he lives on a star thats dying in the night
and follows in the trail the scatter of light

turn it on
turn it on you turn me on mmm yeah
